name: Shape Wars (CasterraDev)
description:
The Shapes are at war and you can't stick to one side.

Once the middle counter hits 0 (By Shooting Enemies) you can pick a side. Choose a different side and you get a stat boost. Choose the same side and you get a Nerf.

WASD to Move

LMB and aim to Shoot

Same shape (Dark Green) are allies

This Game was made for GeoJam 2022 while I was learning Godot.

DevLog: Coming Soon
